Title: Return to the Reach
Description:
Long ago, the Reach was our training ground. Now it's time to return. The island may still hold secrets from our past.

Scalecommander Emberthal has gone on ahead. She awaits the arrival of any who would lend us their aid. We'll need all the help we can get finding a foothold in the Reach. Safe travels.
ObjectivesText: Meet Emberthal in the Forbidden Reach.

Objectives.Text: Find Emberthal in the Forbidden Reach
Speak with Flightmaster Aluri to fly to the Forbidden Reach
